member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_COSMETIC
member.summary: A pen type that specifies a line with a width of one logical unit and a style that is a solid color.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_GEOMETRIC
member.summary: A pen type that specifies a line with a width that is measured in logical units and a style that can contain any of the attributes of a brush.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_ENDCAP_ROUND
member.summary: A line cap that specifies round ends.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_ENDCAP_SQUARE
member.summary: A line cap that specifies square ends.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_ENDCAP_FLAT
member.summary: A line cap that specifies flat ends.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_JOIN_ROUND
member.summary: A line join that specifies round joins.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_JOIN_BEVEL
member.summary: A line join that specifies beveled joins.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_JOIN_MITER
member.summary: A line join that specifies mitered joins when the lengths of the joins are within the current miter length limit. If the lengths of the joins exceed the miter limit, beveled joins are specified.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_SOLID
member.summary: A line style that is a solid color.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_DASH
member.summary: A line style that is dashed.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_DOT
member.summary: A line style that is dotted.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_DASHDOT
member.summary: A line style that consists of alternating dashes and dots.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_DASHDOTDOT
member.summary: A line style that consists of dashes and double dots.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_NULL
member.summary: A line style that is invisible.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_INSIDEFRAME
member.summary: A line style that is a solid color. When this style is specified in a drawing record that takes a bounding rectangle, the dimensions of the figure are shrunk so that it fits entirely in the bounding rectangle, considering the width of the pen.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_USERSTYLE
member.summary: A line style that is defined by a styling array, which specifies the lengths of dashes and gaps in the line.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.PenStyle.PS_ALTERNATE
member.summary: A line style in which every other pixel is set. This style is applicable only to a pen type of PS_COSMETIC.

member.name: F:EmfHelper.EmfParser.mListener
member.summary: Provide the possibility to suppress individual records.

member.name: M:EmfHelper.EmfUtility.CharsToString(System.Char[])
member.summary: charガタの配列を文字列にする。 new string(chars)の場合、charsに\0が含まれていた場合問題がある。 char配列中に\0があればそれ以降を無視する。

member.name: M:EmfHelper.EmfUtility.PointRListToPointLList(System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: 圧縮された相対座標（PointR）の配列をを復元する。 情報がないのでこれは暫定実装。この形式の座標列を見たことがないのでわからない。 データを作っても上手く表示されないのでこの実装は間違っている。
